this_title: Mike Judge Presents: Tales From the Tour Bus
trans_title: 迈克·乔吉剧场：巡演巴士故事
introduction: The series chronicles the tales of some of country music’s most eccentric characters and has eight episodes on the way.Mike Judge Presents: Tales From the Tour Bus is co-created by Judge, Richard Mullins, and The Last Ride co-writer Dub Cornett.  Judge and Cornett executive produce. Bob Engelman (The Mask) is co-executive producer and Mullins is producing.
chinese_title: 迈克·乔吉剧场：巡演巴士故事
foreign_title: Mike Judge Presents: Tales From the Tour Bus
